full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Senior Training Facilitator - Learning Services

**Reference Number**: cb-7371-41594567

## Tender Information
* **Solicitation Number**: W7809A124028
* **Publication Date**: July 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 27, 2023, 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Amendment Date**: August 14, 2023

## Procurement Details
* **Procurement Category**: Service
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Solicitation Method**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Number of Contracts**: 1

## Description of Work
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires four (4) Senior Training Facilitators to provide training services for a period of one (1) year, with three (3) optional one-year periods.

## Eligibility Criteria
The tender is open to Learning Services Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following Stream:

* Stream 5: Training Delivery

## Important Notice
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

## Contract Details
* **Contract Duration**: One (1) year from the award date of the contract + three (3) optional one-year periods
* **Contract Value**: Estimated to be greater than $100,000.00 (CKFTA) and up to $3,750,000.00

## Additional Information
* **Trade Agreements**: The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement
	+ and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

## Contact Information
* **Contracting Authority**: Viktoria Melnichuk
* **Email**: [viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca](mailto:viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (343) 542-1604

You can submit your proposal by following the instructions in the attached Request for Proposal (RFP) document
